CRF encoding maintains a constant quality for all encoded videos.  It adjusts the file size/bit-rate as needed (every video is different!) to maintain the desired quality. You may see a wide range of file sizes...however all have a consistent high quality "CRF"...file sizes never too little and never too big...sized just right to maintain a constant high quality across the board.
